Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1421 CHARLESTON AVENUE, MATTOON, Illinois, 61938, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: First Mid Bancshares Inc is a United States based financial holding company. Through its wholly-owned subsidiary, First Mid Bank, it is primarily engaged in the business of banking. It also provides data processing services to affiliates and insurance products and services to customers through its subsidiary. The company's operations cover community banking, wealth management and insurance services. Key revenue is derived from the provision of community banking services.
